Hi Joshua,

Confirming we have updated the site, The sort services per location is now fixed, the sort will now be based on this field "Services available at this location"

Hi Joshua,

Got it, thanks for that. We will check the site and will see what we can do.

I have reverted back the changes I made for now.

Hey Joel,

This is great thanks, but not exactly what I'm after as this goes across all pages. I'm wanting to customise this per page.

For example on the Ryde page, we want the order


  1. Social & Community participation


  2. Group social & community participation


  3. School leaver employment supports


  4. Finding and keeping a job


  5. etc...


But on the Port Macquarie page, we might want the order to instead be:


  1. Finding and keeping a job


  2. School leaver employment supports


  3. Support Coordination


  4. Psychosocial recovery coach


  5. etc...


Does that make sense? Please let me know if this is possible.

Regards,

Joshua Cook​​​​

Marketing Manager, Disability Services

T 1800 767 212

Hi Joshua,

We have made updates to the backend so you can reorder the list of the services.
Here is a quick video on how to reorder them.
https://www.loom.com/share/abb2ca6b4b2b44648c4aa17036e9d9ed

Let me know if this works for you?

Hi Joshua,

Hope you are doing well. 

This is to notify you that we received your request and we are already working on it. 

We will get back to you tomorrow with the details.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi guys,

We would like to have the services that appear in this box on location pages customised/arranged in a particular order depending on the page:

In Ryde for example, we really want to promote our group social programs over all other services. We may also want to do this in other areas like Port Macquarie, where our school leaver employment programs are higher priority. I've tried dragging them around in the back end page editor but this doesn't seem to affect the order.

Can you please let me know how I can change this, or provide a fix?

Thanks,
Joshua Cook​​​​
Marketing Manager, Disability Services
T 1800 767 212
|
